ygData.subject: RE: New Lullaby theory
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Someone wanna twink/powergame me on Test?  :) Naw, I ll crunch logfiles as they happen during normal play. I m not going to waste days of playtime to track
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 23 Feb 2000, JasonF wrote:
>
> What someone needs to do is start a new bard on Test and run her up to 50
> testing Lullaby the whole way. I nominate John(tm).

Someone wanna twink/powergame me on Test? :)

Naw, I'll crunch logfiles as they happen during normal play.
I'm not going to waste days of playtime to track down a bug
that any programmer could see if they would just come off
their high horse and spend 5 minutes to stare at their code
and think about it.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
